title: Lol client/patcher not downloading after 2/2, stops downloading around 45ish %, Help.
body: I use windows 10, brand new laptop and isn't downloading. I completely deleted the riot games folder from my C: drive and tried reinstalling but hasnt work. Now im not a tech guy but idk what to do.

replies.body:
Issues at 45% during patching are typically caused by a connection issue to the patching servers. Since anything after 33% is when your client is pulling files from the patching servers, conflicting network settings are typically the root cause. I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
